name: MEATGRINDER
description:
Meatgrinder is a high-octane epic FPS. No cutscenes or storylines, just pure action. It's like if Clustertruck met Duke Nukem.

MOVING ENVIRONMENT
Constantly moving environment won't let you rest for a second.

FAST-PACED GAMEPLAY
The game is really fast. You'll have to master your movement - jump, dodge and annihilate enemies before they even see you.

CHAOTIC AND INSANE
Jump your way through insane levels on top of speeding trucks, trains and planes.

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
